pageContext.claim: “TIME Magazine poll and this and that, all these different polls that they had, I won every single poll of every single debate.”
pageContext.analysis: The polls Trump referenced in 2016 were not polls, but “unscientific Internet popularity contests,” which are not designed to predict a full picture of the electorate’s response. Polls from a variety of news sources found most Americans thought Trump lost the debates against former secretary of state Hillary Clinton.
